text: The kind of beauty I want most is the hard-to-get kind that comes from within - strength, courage, dignity.
author: Ruby Dee

text: Beauty for some provides escape, who gain a happiness in eyeing the gorgeous buttocks of the ape or Autumn sunsets exquisitely dying.
author: Langston Hughes

text: To give pain is the tyranny to make happy, the true empire of beauty.
author: Samuel Butler

text: The beauty of the world, which is so soon to perish, has two edges, one of laughter, one of anguish, cutting the heart asunder.
author: Virginia Woolf

text: Every beauty which is seen here by persons of perception resembles more than anything else that celestial source from which we all are come.
author: Michelangelo
